title: Robert Kiyosaki Warns of Mass Layoffs as Government Shutdown Threat Shakes the System

body.raw: Job insecurity, rising economic uncertainty, and looming government shutdowns have prompted Robert Kiyosaki to champion entrepreneurship, asset ownership, and financial freedom over traditional employment. Kiyosaki Sounds the Alarm on Job Security Amid Government Turmoil Robert K
